about_the_game:
Welcome to Cataclysm Upon Us (CUU), a post-apocalyptic survival RPG where the world as you know it has crumbled into chaos and darkness. The game immerses players in a sprawling open world filled with dangerous mutated creatures, shambling zombies, and chilling otherworldly entities.

Survival is key in this unforgiving landscape. As a player, you'll need to forage for food, drinkable water, and scavenged materials. An intricate crafting system allows you to create makeshift weapons, tools, and shelters from the wreckage of the modern civilization.

As you navigate the treacherous world, you'll discover hidden facilities and experimental laboratories. Here, you can unlock the potential of mutations and cybernetic enhancements, adding another layer of complexity to gameplay. Embrace these newfound powers to confront the terrors that now rule the world.

Tactical combat and base building are essential aspects of CUU. Engage in intense battles, stealthy takedowns, and desperate last stands against formidable foes. Fortify your safe havens, create sustainable resources, and expand your shelters to ensure survival.

CUU also offers rich storytelling and RPG elements. You'll make impactful decisions, negotiate with various factions, and forge your own journey through the game's deep storylines. From forming alliances to uncovering hidden truths, your actions will shape the world around you.

Are you ready to confront the darkness? Discover the secrets lying in the ashes of the old world and define your path in Cataclysm Upon Us.

Current Features:
  • Open World Survival RPG: Immerse yourself in a vast, post-apocalyptic world filled with dangerous creatures, zombies, and chilling otherworldly entities.
  • Resource Scavenging & Crafting: Forage for food, drinkable water, and materials. Create makeshift weapons, tools, and shelters from the wreckage of modern civilization.
  • Character Customization: Customize your character's abilities and appearance to fit your playstyle.

short_description: Cataclysm Upon Us is an open world survival RPG. Craft, fight, and build in a world overrun by mutants, zombies and other abominations. Uncover secrets, embrace mutations and cybernetic enhancements. Every decision shapes your journey in this haunting cataclysm. Can you survive the chaos?
